Name: What Causes a Tsunami? - Lesson for Kids
Subject: ['travel', 'airplanes', 'air travel', 'science', 'meteorological disaster', 'weather', 'transports']
Description: Imagine a wall of water hundreds of feet high and traveling as fast as an airplane! This sounds like something impossible and imaginary, but waves like these are very real and very scary. This lesson will explain how tsunamis are formed.
